caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. Two men are engaged in a friendly conversation. At a certain point, one of them says something and walks into the party, while the other man leaves the party and encounters a son in a room. They have a conversation. The son says some words that greatly shock the man. The man contemplates for a while, then returns to the party, engaging with the people there.Two women, along with their sons and daughters, are conversing and seem to appreciate each other. One man provokes another, but the latter doesn't respond. Later that evening, in a room, a man and a woman are lying in bed asleep when someone enters and hands them a letter. After reading it, they are deeply shocked.
